Text.val: Author: Jerry Janssens
Creation date: 30.09.2002
17.09.2014 JH SCR19151 Changed usage of CDSE table into DEPS table
01.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
30.05.2012 GB SCR17358 Extended selection with ADMN_STRUCTUREDCOMFIN = N
16.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
08.09.2010 GB SCR15739 Changed condition for writen Retention differences as
if abs(Invoices - Client) < 1 then not report
06.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
27.04.2010 GB SCR15407 Added condition for store BMQ001 that do not report
Retention differences if V.TOTALRETENTIONC<>0 and abs(Invoices - Client) < 0.10
10.02.2010 GB SCR15315 Changed text message if GB102 is called
28.12.2009 GB SCR15196 Changed calculation for v.TOTALRETENTION
23.11.2009 SH SCR15074 Added CDEP handing
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
21.11.2007 GB SCR13146 Send an email if all clients are tested and one or more
differences were found
05.11.2007 GB SCR13083 changed test that only differences > ABS(10.00) have to
be reported if CLNT108_ACC_CURR <> GNRL_CURRENCY
03.10.2007 AK SCR12948 program write now MQ's with BMQ001 (was direct)
21.08.2007 SH SCR12792 Added test that only differences > ABS(1.00) have to be
reported if CLNT108_ACC_CURR <> GNRL_CURRENCY
05.12.2006 SH SCR12151 Added CMON_CURRENCY as last column to MQTX_TEXT;
Added logic to perform "ProcessCMON" for foreign currency clients
25.04.2006 SH SCR10990 Added test on MQHD_USERID, blank if MQTY_DEPTCODE1<>
13.04.2005 JJ SCR8096 Added check CMON_CURRBALLDEBTORS-CMON_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE
07.10.2003 JJ SCR4505 dropped check CMON_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC
17.06.2003 JJ SCR3782 cont. added use of MQHD/MQDT_USERID
16.06.2003 JJ SCR3782 added use of MQHD/MQDT_HGRP_CODE
09.10.2002 JJ Added use of MQTY_DEPT_CODE1 instead of hardcoded department
08.10.2002 JJ SCR2303 cont. -added call DeleteMQXX to TP
07.10.2002 JJ SCR2303 - added range on CLNTNO <> 99999
-added update of MQDT _TEXT with CLNT110_NAME1
-changed order of amount in MQTX lines to match labels
02.10.2002 JJ Fixed index values of new MQTX lines
Program checks CMON against the sums of INVA
-- Perform the same test for foreign currency clients

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Difference found by BMN511 , please check MQ65')

Text.val: -- In case of foreign currency report only differences if > ABS(10.00)
-- Do not report Retention differences if V.TOTALRETENTIONC <> 0 and
abs(Invoices - Client) < 1
-- If differences were found
Set start of line according to line to write (2, default = blank)
Lines 3 to 7 amounts
Line 1 header
Line 2 header

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select cast (sum(inva_actafactoring) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaretention) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actadisputes) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaspecial) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaextrafin) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/inva inner join :1/invo on invo_no = inva_no and invo_admno = :2 and invo_clntno = :3 and invo_aactuali<>0 where inva_currency= ':4' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT * (-1) * :4/100) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTHELL * (-1) * :4/100) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CDEP join :1/DEPS on DEPS_CDEP_TYPE = CDEP_TYPE and DEPS_HOFF_CODE = ':5' and DEPS_FACTORINGACC = 'Y' where CDEP_ADMNO = :2 and CDEP_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only
